description: I've done over 23 years of my life in prison. It's taken me along time to realize that my hero "the man I grew up idolizeing" the man who fought, drank, did drugs, broke the law, and ran from the police was a dumbass. Since realizing that I've been able to turn from those ways and become a productive law abiding citizen, but it's just recently happened. I'm looking forward to becoming the man I'm capable of being and am in search of a woman that it would mean enough to them knowing that they are giving someone else the strength, or at least knowing that their support is greatly contributing to that person's ability to overcome and achieve success to make them want to reasonabley assess a person, believe in them and stand by their side.
